statements: UPDATE Individualized_Education_Plans SET iep_reviews='Completed' WHERE student_id=101;

UPDATE Individualized_Education_Plans SET iep_objectives='Read 20 pages per day' , iep_reviews='Monthly progress review' WHERE student_id=2;
UPDATE students SET age = 18 WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE iep_tracking SET iep_progress = '80%' WHERE iep_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET student_name = 'John Doe', age = 15, grade_level = '10th', iep_status = true WHERE student_id = 1;

UPDATE IEPGoals SET target_completion_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE goal_id = 3;
UPDATE Students SET grade_level = 10, iep_status = 'Completed' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE IEPProgress SET progress_description = 'Made significant progress towards goal' WHERE progress_id = 3;

UPDATE Teacher SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE teacher_id = 3;
UPDATE Student SET grade = 10, date_of_birth = '2005-08-15' WHERE student_id = 1;

UPDATE teachers SET department = 'Science' WHERE teacher_id = 54321;
